articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Poland vs Scotland in the UEFA Nations League
articles.title: Poland vs Scotland: UEFA Nations League - BBC Sport

articles.description: Follow live audio and text commentary, score updates and match stats from Luxembourg vs Northern Ireland in the UEFA Nations League.
articles.title: Luxembourg vs Northern Ireland: Nations League live

articles.description: San Marino, the world's bottom ranked team, made history as they were promoted to the third tier of the Nations League with the first away win in their history - against Liechtenstein.
articles.title: Liechtenstein 1-3 San Marino: Visitors earn promotion with first ever away win

articles.description: Spain score a dramatic late winner to edge Switzerland in the Nations League, while Denmark also reach the last eight.
articles.title: Spain find late winner to edge Switzerland in the Nations League, while Denmark claim last-eight spot

articles.description: Retiring superstar Rafael Nadal says he will not be distracted by emotion as Spain look to win the Davis Cup in the final tournament of his career.
articles.title: Rafael Nadal focused on Spain success in Davis Cup farewell

articles.description: Sergio Garcia is set to rejoin the DP World Tour for the 2025 season as he seeks to play at next year's Ryder Cup.
articles.title: Sergio Garcia set for DP World Tour return with 2025 Ryder Cup in New York a target

articles.description: Croatia claim a place in the Nations League quarter-finals by drawing with already-qualified Portugal.
articles.title: Croatia 1-1 Portugal: Hosts reach Nations League quarter-finals

articles.description: Lee Carsley believes England and new manager Thomas Tuchel are in "a good position" to win the 2026 World Cup.
articles.title: World Cup 2026: Lee Carsley believes England and Thomas Tuchel are in 'good position' to win trophy

articles.description: Jasmine Paolini's Italy reach their second successive Billie Jean King Cup final with a 2-1 victory over Iga Swiatek's Poland.
articles.title: Billie Jean King Cup: Italy defeat Poland to reach final

articles.description: The bond between GB's players is proving key in their winning run at the Billie Jean King Cup Finals in Malaga.
articles.title: Billie Jean King Cup: Emma Raducanu and Katie Boulter working together to lead Great Britain's pursuit of glory
